Package com.xtructure.xsim

Interfaces for the elements of a simulation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
XAddress An address is an XComponent and a part XId.
XBorder A border between XComponents.
XBorder.Transform A transform.
XClock<F extends XTime.Phase<F>> A simulation clock.
XComponent<F extends XTime.Phase<F>> A component of a simulation.
XReporter<F extends XTime.Phase<F>> A specialized component of XSimulation that prepares aggregated statistics for output.
XSimulation<F extends XTime.Phase<F>> A simulation.
XSimulation.Listener A listener to a simulation.
XTerminator<F extends XTime.Phase<F>> A specialized component of XSimulations that indicate finishing conditions for the simulation.
XTime<F extends XTime.Phase<F>> A simulation time.
XTime.Phase<F extends XTime.Phase<F>> A time phase.
 

Enum Summary
XSimulation.SimulationState An enumeration of simulation states.
 

Package com.xtructure.xsim Description

Interfaces for the elements of a simulation.
